mode.name: codegen
mode.rules: Write clean, tested Python. Be concise. Prefer small, composable functions.

hot_task.prompt: Write a Python function `slugify(s: str) -> str` that converts a string into a URL-safe slug.
hot_task.success_criteria: Lowercase; trim whitespace; replace internal whitespace with hyphens; remove non-alphanumeric characters except hyphens; collapse repeated hyphens; never return empty (return 'x' if needed). Include a few unit tests.
